thread.title: Sky Track Travel Accessories Provides 100 Percent Money Back Guarantee On Its Travel Comfort Set
thread.title_full: Sky Track Travel Accessories Provides 100 Percent Money Back Guarantee On Its Travel Comfort Set

author: prbuzz.com
title: Sky Track Travel Accessories Provides 100 Percent Money Back Guarantee On Its Travel Comfort Set
text:
July 10, 2015 - San Diego, CA -- Sky Track Travel Accessories, a renowned company dealing in products that make the lives of people comfortable, today announced its 100 percent money back guarantee on its ‘luxury comfort set for travelers'. The luxury comfort set comprises a sleep mask, ear plugs, travel pillow and draw string bag. If the customer is not satisfied with the product, the company will refund him, or her, the whole purchase amount.
Speaking to the media, a representative of the company said, "Yes we are providing a 100 percent money back guarantee on our travel set. We have designed the set in such a manner that it gives maximum comfort to the traveller. However should the customer not be satisfied then he, or she, can simply return the product and we will refund the whole purchase amount." He further added, "Our aim is to provide complete satisfaction to our customers with our quality products and services."
The ‘luxury comfort set for travelers' is a suitable solution for long distance travel. The travel pillow included in the set is made from memory foam to prevent pain while on a rough or long journey. It is hypoallergenic and of an ergonomic design. The pillow is flexible and adjusts accurately to any neck size so offering complete support. The other accessories in the set also ensure the traveller total comfort while on the go. The set comes in a strong black bag that is easy to carry. The maintenance of the pillow is simple and it can be washed in a washing machine.
Customers can buy the ‘luxury comfort set for travelers' from online market place Amazon.com at an affordable price.
About Sky Track Travel Accessories
Sky Track Travel Accessories is a family owned business aimed at providing high quality luxury travel accessories for travelers all around the world. They specialize in travel neck pillows, sleep masks, compression socks and many other travel accessories .
